description: This table contains simplified fuel properties for vehicles

schema.name: org_id
schema.description: The Internal ID for the customer's Samsara Org

schema.name: device_id
schema.description: Device ID of the Vehicle Gateway (VG)

schema.name: created_at
schema.description: The timestamp of the event in the format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

schema.name: source_id
schema.description: The ID of the canonical fuel source type

schema.name: source_name
schema.description: The name of the canonical fuel source type

schema.name: fuel_group_id
schema.description: The ID of the simplified fuel group

schema.name: fuel_group_name
schema.description: The name of the simplified fuel group

schema.name: power_train_id
schema.description: The ID of the simplified powertrain

schema.name: power_train_name
schema.description: The name of the simplified powertrain
